project.name: |-- 015-parallel-streams
project.description:
Keywords: + Streams + Parallel Streams
This project includes very simple examples that illustrate how to perform different operations with streams.
HelloParallelStreamRunner: Illustrates how to implement the sum of the first n natural numbers using imperative style and also sequential and parallel streams.
SideEffectsParallelRunner: Illustrates a flawed implementation of the sum of the first n natural numbers that give incorrect results when parallelized because it mutates some state shared between the threads.
